required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of How the Body Breaks Down and Eliminates LY2623091
clinical_study.official_title: Disposition of [14C]-LY2623091 Following Oral Administration in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This type of study is called a radiolabeled study. For this study, LY2623091 (study drug) has been specially prepared to contain radiolabeled carbon [^14C]. [^14C] is a naturally occurring radioactive form of the element, carbon. This study will increase understanding about how the drug appears in the blood, urine, and stool after it is administered to healthy participants. Information about any side effects that may occur will also be collected. This study will last up to 22 days for each participant, not including screening. Screening is required within 28 days prior to enrollment

primary_outcome.measure: Urinary and Fecal Excretion of LY2623091 Radioactivity Over Time Expressed as a Percentage of the Total Radioactive Dose Administered
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 14 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Concentration Curve (AUC0-tlast)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 22 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Concentration Curve (AUC0-infinity)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 22 days post dose
Pre-dose up to 22 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Total Number of Metabolites in Plasma, Urine, and/or Feces
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose up to 14 days post dose

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Overtly healthy males; as determined by physical examination, clinical laboratory tests, medical history and electrocardiograms (ECGs).
- With a body mass index of 18.5 to 32.0 kilogram per square meter (kg/m^2), inclusive.
Exclusion Criteria:

overall_official.last_name: Call 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559) or 1-317-615-4559 Mon - Fri 9 AM - 5 PM Eastern time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST)

facility.name: For additional information regarding investigative sites for this trial, contact 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559, 1-317-615-4559) Mon - Fri from 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST), or speak with your personal physician.
